name: Women in Information and Computer Sciences
description: WICS is a social and professional non-profit organization at UCI established to help and encourage women to pursue a college degree and a successful career in the computer science field.

name: Hack at UCI
description: Hack at UCI is a student-run organization established to provide students with a platform to learn, grow, and develop technology of the future. Established in 2013, their mission is to promote, educate, and enhance the community around us by giving students the platform to learn and create technology.

name: Video Game Development Club
description: The Video Game Development Club (VGDC) at UC Irvine is devoted to providing a community to student game developers. Their mission is to cultivate the game development interest on campus and provide an enriching environment for aspiring student developers to learn and grow.

name: SHINING STARS: A YOUTH ARTS OUTREACH PROGRAM
description: We spark an interest in dance in higher education and the professional realm through workshops hosted by UCI students and dance professionals.

name: Accunting Association Beta Alpha Psi
description: We are vibrant student organizations that work together to build relationships between students and the accounting profession.

name: Wushu Club at UCI
description: At UCI, the Wushu club aims to foster a competitive, yet inviting environment for Wushu athletes of all skill levels, from beginner to advanced.

name: Undergraduate Business Association (UBA)
description: The Undergraduate Business Association (UBA) was founded in 1984 to provide all students at UCI the opportunity to discover a career path based on their business interests and to advance the essential business skills in an effort to build a stepping stone into the business world.
